PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-11092012-09-20,  ,  ,  ND,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
PrecisRegulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES (QR&O) in order to (1) take into consideration the new terminology "record suspension" and to prevent an unprincipled disparity between pardons and record suspensions; and (2) harmonize the QR&O with the National Defence Act provisions amended by Bill C-10.
AttachmentsAttachment
